Description: On I-664 at mile marker 3.3 in the City of Newport News, near Chestnut Avenue, motorists can expect delays due to other security/police activity. All south lanes are closed. The south entrance ramp is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Security/Police Activity - Other Security/Police Activity

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 177 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 257.2 in the City of Newport News, near Victory Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The west exit 256A narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
